resp = client.search(
    query={
        "match": {
            "user.id": "kimchy"
        }
    },
    highlight={
        "pre_tags": [
            "<tag1>",
            "<tag2>"
        ],
        "post_tags": [
            "</tag1>",
            "</tag2>"
        ],
        "fields": {
            "body": {}
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
